Your booking request
Hi {!Online_Bookings__c.Customer_first_name__c},
We've got your booking request. We're confirming your account status and payment details.
Tradesperson: {!Online_Bookings__c.Tradesperson_Text__c} Date: {!Online_Bookings__c.Preferred_date__c} Timeslot: {!Online_Bookings__c.Preferred_arrival_time_slot__c}
If your request is for a date and time in the past, your booking may be scheduled for the following day on the requested arrival time slot. Please make sure to check the booking date on your booking confirmation email as this may vary from the requested booking date in this email.
WHAT'S NEXT
1 If you don't have a valid payment method on file, you'll have received an email with a request to provide a payment method via our secure payment gateway.
2 A booking confirmation email confirming the date and arrival time of our attendance will be sent.
3 As soon as our operative is on the way to your property we'll let you know via email and text message.
4 If you need to contact us, use the blue support button below.
